amendment.description: An amendment numbered 114 printed in Part A of House Report 118-261 to prohibit funding for the Environmental Protection Agency's Justice, Equity, Diversity and Inclusion Workgroup.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Norman amendment (A064) Agreed to by voice vote.
